task_text: Verify rendering in DevMode via JS API: fix DC voltage source misrendering, verify all voltage source types (including rails), verify main elements, and screenshot a standard built-in circuit.
summary: Fixed JSON import geometry sync by applying p1/p2 endpoints and recomputing derived geometry (setPoints) after any setEndpoints; captured screenshot suite for voltage sources, rails, main elements, and imported the built-in voltdivide circuit.

outcome.notes: DC voltage symbol now renders correctly after JSON import; voltage sources + rails + core elements validated via screenshots; standard circuit imported via fetch + importCircuit().
